subject: Re: Your Mortgage Pre_Approval  (2007 Lowest: 25 Y.Fixed - 4.24 %)
body:
Still paying too much for your current mortgage? 
Why NOT Refinance us with lower rate? 

Great News, You are Pre_Approved for following Interest Rate.
Our loan department is trying to reach you One Last Time
since previous attempts to contact you  all failed. 

30 Y.Fixed  -  4.29 %  

You qualify for up to $284,000 for a monthly 
pmt as low as $682
Save up to 41% off current payment, guaranteed!

Please complete this final step upon receiving this notice
immediately, and submit your application now: 

http://ilook.tw/abtf
